name: Triton International Limited
description: Triton International Limited is a leading provider of intermodal freight containers and chassis. Established in 2016, Triton has quickly grown to become one of the largest container leasing companies in the world. The company operates a fleet of over 5 million intermodal containers and chassis, which are utilized in the transportation of goods across the globe. Triton's mission is to provide high-quality equipment and exceptional service to its customers, facilitating international trade and supply chain efficiency. With a diverse customer base that includes shipping lines, freight forwarders, and logistics companies, Triton is strategically positioned to meet the growing demands of the global shipping industry. The company focuses on maintaining a modern and efficient fleet, investing in innovative technologies to enhance operational efficiency and sustainability. Triton is committed to environmental responsibility, actively seeking ways to reduce the carbon footprint of its operations. The company’s strong financial performance is supported by its extensive global presence and a robust lease portfolio, ensuring stable cash flows and attractive returns for its investors. With a dedicated team of industry professionals, Triton continues to leverage its expertise to adapt to market trends and challenges, solidifying its position as a trusted partner in the logistics and transportation sector.

faq.answer: Brian M. Sondey is the CEO of Triton International Limited.

faq.answer: Triton is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.

faq.question: What types of products does Triton offer?
faq.answer: Triton offers intermodal containers, refrigerated containers, and chassis.
